scripts.test: npm run preload:testDataLogin && npm run preload:testDataToken && npm run preload:testDataBooking && npm run preload:testDataBookingList && npx playwright test
scripts.test:auth:login: npm run preload:testDataLogin && npx playwright test tests/auth/features/login --headed
scripts.test:booking:list: npm run preload:testDataToken && npx playwright test tests/booking/features/list --headed
scripts.test:booking:create: npm run preload:testDataToken && npm run preload:testDataBooking && npx playwright test tests/booking/features/create --headed
scripts.test:booking:read: npm run preload:testDataToken && npm run preload:testDataBookingList && npx playwright test tests/booking/features/read --headed
scripts.test:booking:update: npm run preload:testDataToken && npm run preload:testDataBooking && npx playwright test tests/booking/features/update --headed
scripts.test:booking:delete: npm run preload:testDataToken && npm run preload:testDataBookingList && npx playwright test tests/booking/features/delete --headed
